dict.acceptation: 容忍；产生作用；（尤指迅速或随手）放置；阻延或推迟；
棍棒，棍枝；枝条；操纵杆；球棍；

sent.orig: Stick your hands up!(Stick'em up!Stick them up!)
Then she climbed on the box, caughtthe stick and knocked down the food with the stick.
sent.trans: 华秀找到了一根棍子，她站到箱子上，用棍子将食物敲了下来。

sent.orig: Stick to your principles; stick to the diet.
sent.trans: 坚持你的原则；坚持食谱。

sent.orig: For analog-stick-based controllers, the input is done by twirling the stick.
sent.trans: 对于模拟棒型控制器，输入是通过旋转着的木棒。

sent.orig: Perhaps, as in life, running, and sometimes really need to stick to-and then stick over them.
sent.trans: 也许，人生如同跑步，有时真的需要坚持下去——再坚持下去就过去了。
